alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 31 at 9:40PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM PDT MONDAY THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central Nevada and southern Nevada, including the following areas, in south central Nevada, Esmeralda and Central Nye County. In southern Nevada, Western Clark and Southern Nye County. * WHEN...From 9 AM PDT Monday through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorm development is expected to begin late Monday morning persisting into the evening hours. These storms will be capable of producing heavy rainfall resulting in flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
